Package tutorials.classification

Provides tutorials for the Classifier interface and the associated classes for evaluation and performance assessment.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TutorialCrossValidation
    This tutorial shows how you can do cross-validation with Java-ML
    TutorialCVSameFolds
    This tutorial shows how you can do multiple cross-validations with the same folds.
    TutorialEvaluateDataset
    This tutorial show how to use the EvaluateDataset class to test the performance of a classifier on a data set.
    TutorialKDependentBayes
    Tutorial for K Dependent Bayes classifier
    TutorialKDtreeKNN
    This tutorial show how to use a the k-nearest neighbors classifier.
    TutorialKNN
    This tutorial show how to use a the k-nearest neighbors classifier.
    TutorialLibSVM
    This tutorial show how to use a the LibSVM classifier.
    TutorialNaiveBayes
    Tutorial for Naive Bayes classifier
    TutorialRandomForest
    Tutorial for the random forest classifier.
    TutorialSelfOptimizingLibSVM
    This tutorial show how to use a the LibSVM classifier.

Package tutorials.classification Description

Provides tutorials for the Classifier interface and the associated classes for evaluation and performance assessment. These tutorials show how you can construct objects from classes that implement the Classifier interface.
